root.name: Bit.Trip Saga
root.description: OverviewBit.Trip Saga is an upcoming 3DS compilation of the Bit.Trip series, originally developed by Gaijin Games for WiiWare. Rather than be served up in a downloadable format, Bit.Trip Saga will be released at retail on 3DS game cards through Aksys Games, who also served as the games' original downloadable publisher.GamesBit.Trip Saga contains all six entries in the series. Each game is based on separate and distinct gameplay mechanics. In order of their original release, the games are:Bit.Trip BeatBit.Trip CoreBit.Trip VoidBit.Trip RunnerBit.Trip FateBit.Trip FluxThe games' graphics are receiving a minor change to allow for the three-dimensional display of the 3DS. It is not currently known how the controls of each game will be adapted for the handheld.
